content: 14 16 18 20 ssk k1 turn work row 2 ws sl1wyif move yarn over the right needle and pull the stitch around the needle so that the two legs of the stitch appear on the needle this is a german short-row p 3 5 5 5 7 7 7 9 9 9 p2tog p1 turn work row 3 rs sl1wyif pull slipped stitch around the needle k4 6 6 6 8 8 8 10 10 10 stopping just before the two- legged pulled stitch ssk making sure to catch both legs of the pulled stitch and knitting it together with the next stitch k1 turn work size small preemie will run out of stitches on this row move on to the next paragraph ws row sl1wyif pull slipped stitch around p until just before the pulled stitch on the previous row p2tog making sure to catch both legs of the pulled stitch p1 turn work size preemie out of stitches move on to the next paragraph rs row sl1wyif pull slipped stitch around k until just before the pulled stitch on the previous row ssk k1 turn work repeat these last two row until you run out of stitches sizes small preemie 0-3 mo 3-6 mo 6-12 mo 2-3 y 3-4 y 5-6 y 7-8 y will be one stitch short on the final rs row for these sizes you do the final k2tog as before and then turn as you are out of stitches sizes small preemie 0-3 mo 3-6 mo 6-12 mo 2-3 y 3-4 y 5-6 y 7-8 y ws row sl1 p 4 - 8 8 10 - 12 14 16 18 p2tog rs row sl1 k 5 - 9 9 11 - 13 15 17 19 sizes preemie 1-2 y ws sl1wyif pull slipped stitch around p - 7 - - - 11 - - - - p2tog p1 turn rs row sl1wyif pull slipped stitch around k - 9 - - - 13 - - - - this pattern is distributed for free through ravelry com the pattern may not be sold for profit or distributed through other channels you lillalin may however sell the finished product as long as you give credit to the pattern © caroline lindholm / lillalin 2018 page 3 6 10 10 10 12 14 14 16 18 20 heel stitches remaining foot pick up 5 7 8 8 9 10 11 12 14 16 stitches along the right side of the heel flap pm pick up one more stitch adjacent to the instep stitches and k this one together with the first held stitch in a k2tog k 8 12 14 14 16 18 20 22 24 30 one held stitch remaining pick up a stitch to the left of the next stitch just before the start of the heel flap and k this together with the last held stitch in a ssk pm pick up 5 7 8 8 9 10 11 12 14 16 stitches
